name: Project Alkawing
description:
This is the first demo or prototype of the game, the objective is to collect the fragments of energy distributed throughout the universe, which is generated procedurally, the fragments of energy are also generated infinitely.

If I continue with this project the next version will already have music, sorry I know that's very important for a game but I can't find something good for now and I would like some feedback before I continue with this.

Controls:

WAD or Arrows: Move

Space: Shoot
